ThingDef.label: Space Wheat Plant
ThingDef.description: A short, fast-growing crop that yields small edible grains. Grind into flour!

ThingDef.label: Ambrosia Deus Plant
ThingDef.description: The elite's choice. Contains Space Drugs, Bicaridine, Synaptizine and Hyperzine.

ThingDef.label: Ambrosia Vulgaris Plant
ThingDef.description: Contains Space Drugs, Bicaridine, Kelotane and toxins. (Space weed)

ThingDef.label: Banana Tree
ThingDef.description: Once eaten, gives a slippery peel.

ThingDef.label: Blood Tomato Plant
ThingDef.description: They are so red... and indeed have Blood in them.

ThingDef.label: Blue Space Tomato Plant
ThingDef.description: Occasionally teleports thrower/target to a random location. Experts baffled.

ThingDef.label: Chanterelle Mushroom
ThingDef.description: Not as tasty as Plump Helmets.

ThingDef.label: Cherry Plant
ThingDef.description: For pies and jelly. They can't be used as earrings ; a shame.

ThingDef.label: Cocoa Plant
ThingDef.description: Give it to the chef to fill station with happiness.

ThingDef.label: Coffee Arabica Plant
ThingDef.description: Dry them out to make coffee.

ThingDef.label: Coffee Robusta Plant
ThingDef.description: Dry them out to make coffee.

ThingDef.label: Corn Plant
ThingDef.description: Use a hatchet on a bare cob to make a pipe for that sweet Ambrosia! May have more nefarious applications as well...

ThingDef.label: Death Nettle Plant
ThingDef.description: A red nettle that knocks people down with massive damage. Highly illegal, Contains Polytrinic acid.

ThingDef.label: Egg-Plant
ThingDef.description: Do Chickens lay egg plant seeds or do egg plants hatch Chickens?

ThingDef.label: Glow Berry Bush
ThingDef.description: Berries that glows in the dark. Might not be wise to consume, they grow radium.

ThingDef.label: Grass Patch
ThingDef.description: Instrumental in turning the station into your own groovy love jungle.

ThingDef.label: Harebell Flower
ThingDef.description: So useless only your bio generator will be happy to get some.

ThingDef.label: Ice Pepper Plant
ThingDef.description: Instead of being hot, those mutated Chilis are cold. Chef can use them.

ThingDef.label: Lemon Tree
ThingDef.description: Ugh... sour... Give these to the Bartender.

ThingDef.label: Lime Tree
ThingDef.description: A very sour fruit. Another fruit used in cocktails.

ThingDef.label: Nettle Plant
ThingDef.description: Take with botanical gloves, whip intruders. Contains Sulfuric acid.

ThingDef.label: Nova Flower
ThingDef.description: A burning flower, to be handled with gloves. Contains capsaicin.

ThingDef.label: Pumpkin Plant
ThingDef.description: Carve this into a scary face or a hat!

ThingDef.label: Space Tobacco Plant
ThingDef.description: Dry them out first. Contains Dexalin, who knew smoking could improve your lungs?

ThingDef.label: Sugarcane Plant
ThingDef.description: Come and get the sugar from the cane!

ThingDef.label: Aspera Tea
ThingDef.description: These aromatic tips of the tea plant can be dried to make tea.

ThingDef.label: Astra Tea
ThingDef.description: These aromatic tips of the tea plant can be dried to make tea.

ThingDef.label: Tobacco Plant
ThingDef.description: Dry them out to make some smokes.

ThingDef.label: Tomato Plant
ThingDef.description: Staple in making ketchup and expressing yourself to the clown.

ThingDef.label: Towercap Tree
ThingDef.description: Cut trunks with the hatchet to make wooden planks.

ThingDef.label: Watermelon Plant
ThingDef.description: Filled with watery goodness and regular boring biomass.
